mapper.select: select sg.id, u.user_name,u.headimgurl, sg.user_id,sg.goods_num,sg.goods_title,sg.goods_content,sg.goods_img, sg.goods_price,sg.goods_old_price,sg.postion,sg.views,sw.field as goods_way, stw.field as trading_way ,st.field as goods_type, sg.gmt_created from secondary_goods as sg LEFT JOIN secondary_way as sw on sw.id=sg.goods_way LEFT JOIN secondary_type as st on st.id=sg.goods_type LEFT JOIN secondary_trading_way as stw on stw.id = sg.trading_way LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=sg.user_id where sg.`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sg.user_id = #{sellId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by gmt_created desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sg.id, u.user_name,u.headimgurl, sg.user_id,sg.goods_num,sg.goods_title,sg.goods_content,sg.goods_img, sg.goods_price,sg.goods_old_price,sg.postion,sg.views,sw.field as goods_way, stw.field as trading_way ,st.field as goods_type, sg.gmt_created from secondary_goods as sg LEFT JOIN secondary_order as seo on sg.id=seo.goods_id LEFT JOIN secondary_way as sw on sw.id=sg.goods_way LEFT JOIN secondary_type as st on st.id=sg.goods_type LEFT JOIN secondary_trading_way as stw on stw.id = sg.trading_way LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=sg.user_id where seo.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by gmt_created desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sg.id,sg.status ,u.user_name,sg.user_id from secondary_goods as sg LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=sg.user_id where sg.id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select sg.id, u.user_name,u.headimgurl, sg.user_id,sg.goods_num,sg.goods_title, sg.goods_content,sg.goods_img,sg.goods_price,sg.goods_old_price,sg.postion,sg.views, sw.field as goods_way,stw.field as trading_way ,st.field as goods_type, seo.gmt_created,seo.order_id,seo.goods_id,seo.seller_id,seo.seller,seo.consignee,seo.receivePhone,seo.receiveAddress,seo.gmt_created from secondary_goods as sg LEFT JOIN secondary_order as seo on sg.id=seo.goods_id LEFT JOIN secondary_way as sw on sw.id=sg.goods_way LEFT JOIN secondary_type as st on st.id=sg.goods_type LEFT JOIN secondary_trading_way as stw on stw.id = sg.trading_way LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=sg.user_id where seo.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and seo.order_state = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by gmt_created desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
